description: A classic creamy Caesar salad with a hint of bitterness from the olives and the added crunch of nuts.
name: Caesar Salad with Olives & Nuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 heads baby gem lettuce, washed and torn

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the bacon lardons on a pan on a medium heat with the oil for 6 minutes or until lightly crisped. Add the torn cooked chicken to the pan and fry with the bacon for 1 minute to warm it up.
You can combine the rest of the ingredients together in a serving bowl. Remove the bacon and chicken from the pan, drain any oil or liquid and mix in with the salad before serving.
